Title: Scars of Dracula
Writer: Anthony Hinds (screenplay), Bram Stoker (based on the character created by)
Actors: Christopher Lee, Dennis Waterman, Jenny Hanley, Christopher Matthews
Plot: A young man, Paul Carlson, is on a trip and spends the night at Count Dracula's castle. He is murdered. After some time has passed, the young man's brother Simon comes to the small town ...
